name: pnp-copilot-pro-dev-da-PMSpecReviewer
title: PM Spec Reviewer
shortDescription: A Microsoft Teams app that helps Product Managers review product specifications using AI assistance.
longDescription: An agent that reviews PM specs and nudges users towards simplicity, clarity, brevity. Give it a spec as input and it will review it and provide feedback.

thumbnails.alt: Declarative agent is pending an image, this is a placeholder

references.name: Microsoft 365 Copilot extensibility
references.description: Learn more about what Microsoft 365 Copilot and how you can extend it.
